tags: has this one been done yet?
summary:
*Jon starts to walk away*
Daenerys: And it was nice to see you again. 
Jon, turning around: Were you talking to my...
body:
*Jon starts to walk away*

Daenerys: And it was nice to see you again.

Jon, turning around: Were you talking to my butt?

Daenerys: ……Yes.

Jon: Okay.

tags: omg i cant believe i wasted time doing this lol
i really just wanted a gif set paralleling jon and dany's failed attempts at flirting with each other
and then i spiraled into this
oh no does this read like a political!jon post lmao
title: How to Win Allies (and Hearts)
body:
aka Jon Snow’s Guide to Flirting with Queens

1. Don’t insult her children (even if they are pretty scary-looking and could eat you).

2. Don’t call her by the nickname her abusive brother gave her.

3. When she finally expresses interest, don’t then jump on a boat that will take you to your certain death.

4. Plan fun activities for the two of you to do together, like spelunking and interpreting primitive cave drawings.

5. Put your life in immediate peril so she’ll realize just how much you mean to her (but try not to get her or her children killed in the process).

6. A little BDE never hurt, either.

7. Swear your undying fealty to her, privately and publicly.

8. After peace talks fail, corner her in the place where her ancestors saw the beginning of their end and tell her she’s Not Like Other Girls.

9. To cheer her up, try a little gallows humor.

10. Casually hint at your desire to be a father and have babies with her.

11. Arrange an all-expenses-paid sex cruise with her.

12. Once you’ve acquired her consent, show her that BDE of yours ain’t just figuratively speaking.

By following these 12 simple steps, you, too, can attract the queen of your dreams!

sources: x x x x x x x x x x x x x 

special thanks to @adecila​ for helping me hunt some of these gifs down!

summary: Jon is BOTH the dragon and the wolf (707). So yeah, it could be about him and Dany, but it could be JUST about himself because...
body:
Jon is BOTH the dragon and the wolf (707). So yeah, it could be about him and Dany, but it could be JUST about himself because of his parentage revealed.

Two interpretations and that’s why it’s a great show, since there are many theories, and after all, have we found the good one ? The end will certainly be mind blowing.

Bran : “he needs to know the truth about himself. “

Just wanted to be clear… Yes, there’s the language barrier, and sometimes there’s misunderstandings and I’m sorry for that I do what I can (si seulement tout le monde pouvait parler français haha ce serait tellement plus simple)

but apparently it’s not that easy with this shipping war *sigh*, you can’t discuss without argue and without someone saying : “lolololol so stupid and insane people Jonsa is nonsense smiley/smiley/smiley/smiley”…

I guess you all know who I’m talking about but please, try to be more mature than this! The GOT fandom doesn’t need this kind of attitude.

summary: fall away resistance - Chapter 1 - chininja - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin [Archive of Our Own]
title: fall away resistance - Chapter 1 - chininja - A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/2
Fandom: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Jon Snow/Sansa Stark
Characters: Jon Snow, Sansa Stark, Arya Stark, Jeyne Westerling
Additional Tags: It all started with a dick pic but it somehow led to angst??, also, not literally a dick pic, It is a drawing though
Series: Part 4 of In Every World
Summary:

He’s a mess, he knows he’s a mess because just the thought of not having Sansa in any capacity in his life is giving him a panic attack.
–
In which I write and present you with angst inspired by The Break-Up.

I’ve now written a chaptered fic. Who is she?
